price: 12. Yende azali komonisa bino bongengi, ezali kobangisa bino na nkake mpe ezali kopesa bino elikya mpe azali kokomisa mapata mazala kilo.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمُ ٱلۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَيُنشِئُ ٱلسَّحَابَ ٱلثِّقَالَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yurīkumu al-barqa khawfan waṭamaʿan wayunshi-u al-saḥāba al-thiqāla
